Class PingTimer

  • Constructor Details

    • PingTimer

      public PingTimer(String clientID, String lobbyID, RemoteClient client)
      Creates a new PingTimer instance.
      Parameters:
      clientID - the ID of the client
      lobbyID - the ID of the lobby
      client - the remote client object

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start()
      Starts the ping timer. If a timer is already running, it will be canceled and a new timer will be created.

    • receivedPing

      public void receivedPing()
      Receives a ping from the client and resets the timer. If a timer is running, it will be canceled and a new timer will be started.

    • interrupt

      public void interrupt()
      Interrupts the timer. If a timer is running, it will be canceled.

    • getClient

      public RemoteClient getClient()
      Returns the remote client object associated with the timer.
      Returns:
      the remote client object
